content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy, together with the military and government officials, held a meeting on drones and electronic warfare systems.

The head of statereportedIn telegrams.

"They have updated and detailed production plans for the current year for all types of drones: FPV, bombers, scouts, as well as for long -range drones for special tasks," - the message reads.

The meeting also discussed how to ensure the flexibility of the Ukrainian defense industry, as the needs of the front are constantly changing, and our manufacturers should respond in a timely manner.

"Important solutions: to simplify the procurement procedure, import of equipment, increase the production of shells for drones and train operators," the President said.

The project was also discussed by the construction of a comprehensive system for the management of HRB to protect our soldiers and equipment from Russian UAVs.

"The system is already being tested in certain areas. We plan to scale the project to the entire front," Volodymyr Zelenskyy added.
